sentences.en: A scamp put the arm on him last night when he was on his way home.
sentences.cn: 昨晚在回家的路上,他遭到流氓的抢劫.

sentences.en: Don't pamper damp scamp tramps that camp under ramp lamps.
sentences.cn: 不要纵容那些斜坡的街灯下露营的湿著身子的流浪街童.

sentences.en: Don't pamper scamp tramps that camp under ramp lamps.
sentences.cn: 不要纵容那些浑身湿漉漉的流氓在斜坡的路灯下践踏露营地.

sentences.en: Don't pamperdamp scamp tramps that camp under ramp lamps.
sentences.cn: 要宠潮湿恶棍流浪汉营地下坡道灯.

sentences.en: Don't scamp your work because you are pressed for time.
sentences.cn: 引擎并不是因为燃料耗尽而停止运转.

sentences.en: Have some respect for me, you scamp!
sentences.cn: 对我尊重点，你这个小混蛋!

sentences.en: Ho, that Nathan, he is a scamp, no?
sentences.cn: 哦，那个纳森可是个流氓哦。

sentences.en: Longing for freedom Scamp ventures far from home and meets a lovely , reluctant stray named Angel.
sentences.cn: 斯卡特一向渴望自由生活,故此决定远走高飞,离开家园!

sentences.en: Maybe we did misjudge the scamp about not being a soldier.
sentences.cn: 也许我们不相信他当过兵是把这个流氓估计错了.

sentences.en: That little scamp Jimmy has hidden my slippers again!
sentences.cn: 这个调皮的小吉米又把我的拖鞋藏起来了!

sentences.en: You must n't ever let that scamp come into your house again!
sentences.cn: 你可决不能让这个流氓再到你们家来了!
